text:
Meadow (YC W15) | San Francisco, CA | Onsite | https://getmeadow.com/dispensary-software

Meadow builds the best software for the cannabis industry. Our modern Point of Sale helps power hundreds of dispensaries from large retailers to small mom-and-pop delivery services.

To learn more about who we are, our engineering culture, and whether this is the right place for you, read our Key Values profile: https://www.keyvalues.com/meadow

Here are our open roles:

- Senior Full-Stack Engineer: https://getmeadow.com/jobs

Tech Stack: Node.js React PostgreSQL Swift Redis
